page.title: 17MY MUM'S DAY, DUNSCROFT
page.content: My mum gets up at 8 o'clock every morning and gets washed and dressed. She has breakfast with us and when we have gone to school she goes up to the shops with the dog for a few provisions. When she comes home she puts the food in the cupboard and makes a drink. Afterwards she goes around the house polishing and 'hoovering' up. Then she has dinner and washes the pots. During the afternoon she knits and watches television. At about 5 o'clock she makes tea. After tea she washes the pots -again, and then goes to the Bingo. She goes to bed at about 11 o'clock and goes straight to sleep.
